gameplay

Class ExitWay

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplay.ExitWay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ExitWay
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    The ExitWay class stores pseudo-randomly places an exitway on the grid and loads it's image.

    Author:
    Rakinul Huq
    See Also:
    Game, GameState, Player, Serialized Form

        public static int randInt(int min,
                          int max)
        Given two integers, min and max, this method will return a pseudo-random integer value contained between these two integers.
        Parameters:
        min - Minimum value which may be returned.
        max - Maximum value which may be returned.
        Returns:
        An int between min and max inclusively.
